problem_text: Model caffeine decay with C(t) = 200(0.5)^(t/5). Find the amount remaining after 10 and 15 hours.
Graph C(t) and determine when caffeine falls below 30mg. What does this mean in real life?
solution_text: Estimate t ≈ 16.5 hours. Connect to sleep disruption, stimulant dependency.
